pages.text: Mod addons are mods that add content or change content in other mods! Thingamajigs has some in the Neo-version.
Two addons exist. Thingamajigs 2 Goodies, and Thingamajigs 2 Railroadways. Both require Thingamajigs as a base mod to function properly.
Previously, all content was in Thingamajigs, but to reduce clutter and unwanted features, some features have been split from the main mod into their own separate addons.
